Text:
hey hi!
thnks for the classic
you welcome :) I just thought not everybody is happy to wait 4+ giga,when can have it in 700 mb.. ;)

Thanks nikitan1. Picture is superb but i have problems with the subtitles. They dont fit to the screen, I only can see some part of them. Like that they are narrowed from the sides. Any sugestions?
Thanks!
A 10
V 10

Hi erPlay you welcome :) the subs can be enabled/disabled, so if you use VLC you can do from main menu "Video"->"Subtitles track".. in your case I suspect you have set the font size for the text too big.. again, if you use VLC you can lower the size from "Tools"->"Preferences"->"Subtitles&OSD"->"Subtitles effects" :) hope that helps.. ;)

Thanks!!
Keep ripping. You are doing great
